Classes

Local

Internal class

Instance Methods

constructor(@local, method, @asynchronous)

Remote

Internal class

Instance Methods

constructor(@rpc, methods)

Rpc

Main class: see README.md for information

Instance Methods

constructor()

out(send)

send is a function that takes 2 parameters which are the 2 formats of the message to send: as a JSON object and as a stringified object

process(message)

execute local method upon remote request (the request being in the message)

remote(methods)

Returns a new remote object implementing the methods

implement(local, methods)

Publish the methods of local. Those methods are now available to the rpc object The methods are synchronous: the value they returned is sent back.

implementAsync(local, methods)

Publish the methods of local. Those methods are now available to the rpc object The methods are asynchronous: a callback is passed to these methods to sent back results.

log(text)

Console log messages going in to be processed and going out. This method can be overloaded to disable or customize logging.

wsRpc

in(ws)

ioRpc

extends Rpc

RPC extension that supports socket.io

Instance Methods

constructor(socket)

socket is a valid socket.io socket
